QuestData.Title: A Fair Trade
QuestData.Description: <The roar bellows out again, louder and more fierce than any of the yetis you've encountered so far. Again, a grummle voice replies...>$B$BEep! Please, great Kota Kon, forgive grummle. Let me go, I'll bring lots of kafa right away! Promise!$B$B<The beast called Kota Kon answers with another meaty roar.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Bundle of Kafa'kota Berries to the Lair of Kota Kon, near the top of Kota Peak.
QuestData.CompletionText: Kota Kon wants more kafa, but I already fed her all I have! Then I tried giving her a nice bow, but she's not satisfied!$B$B<The terrified grummle gulps and leans in close to whisper.>$B$BI think she can smell the kafa I drank for breakfast...
QuestData.RewardText: You brought kafa?!$B$BYou...$B$BMagnificent...$B$BLuckydo...$B$BHurry, let's give it to her! Maybe she won't have us both for snack...
